rules_text:
[i]({T}: Add {U}.)[/i]
Sturmkeld Rookery enters tapped unless you control a Plains and a Swamp.
{2}{W}{U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Sturmkeld Rookery: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may cast a spell from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Activate only as a sorcery.
